webscript.shortname: Applies fixes to the content model for DoD certification.
webscript.description:
This webscript applies necessary changes to the RM custom model in the repository. These changes are to 'patch' a deployed RM custom model during the DoD certification process. With that in mind they are safe to apply to a live database i.e. without side-effect to existing data and safe to call multiple times. They are not needed for a clean deployment.
Please note that this script will be removed after the certification process is complete.
